name: about
description: Displays the bot's support server, status, version, maintainer, and invite link.

name: albumplays
description: Displays user's play count of an album.

name: artistplays
description: Displays user's play count of an artist.

name: ban
description: Bans a user from accessing the bot and showing up on the 'whoknows' list.

name: beta
description: Toggles beta features in a server.

name: chart
description: Generates user's weekly, monthly, or yearly top-albums chart. By default, `period` is 'weekly', `grid size` is '5x5', and `notitles` is turned off.

name: config
description: Configures CrownBot's preferences in a guild.

name: crownboard
description: Displays the server's crown leaderboard.

name: crowns
description: Displays crowns of a user.

name: deletecrowns
description: Deletes user's crowns either locally or globally.

name: eval
description: You aren't supposed to be seeing this.

name: globalban
description: Globally ban a user from accessing the bot and showing up on the 'whoknows' list.

name: globalunban
description: Globally unban without affecting per-guild ban.

name: help
description: Lists the available commands.

name: list
description: Lists user's weekly, monthly, or yearly top artists or songs.

name: login
description: Logs user into the botâ€•linking their Discord and LastFM account in the database.

name: logout
description: Logs user out of the bot.

name: mylogin
description: Displays user's Last.fm username.

name: overview
description: Displays user's scrobble overview for an artist.

name: permissions
description: Lists required permissions with brief descriptions.

name: playing
description: Displays list of songs being played in a server by registered users.

name: prefix
description: Changes bot prefix for a guild.

name: recent
description: Lists user's recently played songs.

name: stats
description: Displays user's scrobbling stats.

name: taste
description: Compares same-artist plays between two users.

name: topalbums
description: Displays user's top-played albums of an artist.

name: topalbumtracks
description: Displays user's top-played tracks in an album.
examples: tat In the Aeroplane Over the Sea

name: trackplays
description: Displays user's play count of a song.

name: unban
description: Unban a banned user.

name: whoknows
description: Checks if anyone in a guild listens to a certain artist. If no artist is defined, the bot will try to look up the artist you are currently listening to.

name: whoknowsalbum
description: Checks if anyone in a guild listens to a certain album.
examples: whoknowsalbum Room On Fire || The Strokes

name: whoknowstrack
description: Checks if anyone in a guild listens to a certain track.
examples: whoknowstrack Last Man Standing || People In Planes

name: graph
description: Graphs user's last week, month, or year's, or all-time playing stats; defaults to week.

name: lyrics
description: Shows lyrics for user's 'now-playing' (or explicitly specified) song.

name: nowplaying
description: Displays user's 'now-playing' or the last scrobbled track.
